availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Faulkner (Taylor County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of Thomas Faulkner and Nancy Faulkner. Married to Elizabeth Atkinson Faulkner in Taylor County, Kentucky on September 19, 1858. Father of Thomas C. Faulkner, Mary E. Faulkner, and George Faulkner. Resident of Knox County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Taylor County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Knox, p. 360A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor, Division 2, p. 652.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor, Ireland, p. 243B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Taylor County Marriages, Film #000983728, p. 110.
